metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3509 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage 4, in the Dashboard component. Inresponse to CVE-2020-27839, the JWT token was moved from localStorage to anhttpOnly cookie. However, token cookies are used in the body of the HTTPresponse for the documentation, which again makes it available to XSS.Thegreatest threat to the system is for confidentiality, integrity, andavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 15.2.12-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
